landing.bio: Upcoming NuCamp Full Stack Web and Mobile graduate offering a strong foundation in software development and programming principles across multiple platforms. Experienced in object-oriented programming; functional programming; developing, testing and debugging code; designing interfaces. Quickly learn and master new technologies; successful working in both team and self-directed settings.

experience.position: Full Stack Web and Mobile Development Portfolio Project
experience.aboutWork: Project Scope: Worked as part of a two-member team to produce an interactive Choose your own adventure game using React. Prototyped user interface and mapped logical output for story progression and tested using JSON server.
experience.tools: React, JavaScript, JSON Server, Bootstrap, Visual Studio Code.

experience.aboutWork: Collaborated with lead designer to improve upon existing 3D animated videos to promote artwork from storyboarding through to production
experience.tools: Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro, Audition.

education.degree: Full Stack Web and Mobile Development
education.class2: Multiplatform Mobile App Development: React Native
education.class3: Front-End UI Frameworks and Tools: Bootstrap

education.activity: Tae Kwon-Do Team Captain, Volunteer Sports Coach

interests.paragraphOne: In my free time I often play video games. I love games from a variety of genres from MMOs like World of Warcraft to platformers such as the Super Mario series. This hobby stemmed into another pastime of learning how to build games using Unity and C#. I'm thankful for the large number of free tutorials available online to fuel my game building curiosities. Here are a couple examples of what I've been able to produce as a result.
